languages.text: Each attack against the Vanguard grants them +1 stack of unyielding beacon. Each stack increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}Temporary wounds{/g} applied to the Vanguard now stack, but only remain stacked until the start of the Vanguard's turn. At the start of their turn, the remaining temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to the largest amount granted by one applied effect. If the remaining number of temporary wounds is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary wounds at the start of their turn.
languages.original_text:
Каждая атака против авангарда дает ему +1 уровень эффекта "{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}знак стойкости{/g}". Каждый уровень повышает его {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} на 1 вплоть до 15. Все союзники в радиусе 2 клеток от авангарда получают 1/5 от этого {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонуса{/g}.
Бонусы {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g} авангарда теперь суммируются, но только до начала его хода. Когда ход начинается, все эффекты, предоставляющие временное {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}, снимаются, кроме одного — с наибольшим бонусом. Если оставшееся значение временного здоровья меньше, чем число знаков стойкости, или вовсе равно 0, то временное здоровье авангарда становится равным числу его знаков стойкости.

traits.locale_text:
Each attack against the Vanguard grants them 1 stack of unyielding beacon. Each stack increases their resolve by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that bonus.
Temporary wounds applied to the Vanguard now stack, but remain stacked until the start of the Vanguard's turn. At the start of their turn, the remaining temporary wounds are reduced to the largest amount granted by one applied effect. If the remaining number of temporary wounds is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary wounds at the start of their turn.

Each attack against the Vanguard grants them +1 stack of unyielding beacon. Each stack increases their resolve by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that bonus.
Temporary wounds applied to the Vanguard now stack, but only remain stacked until the start of the Vanguard's turn. At the start of their turn, the remaining temporary wounds are reduced to the largest amount granted by one applied effect. If the remaining number of temporary wounds is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary wounds at the start of their turn.

Each stack increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}Temporary wounds{/g} applied to the Vanguard now stack, but only remain stacked until the start of the Vanguard's turn. At the start of their turn, the remaining temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to the largest amount granted by one applied effect. If the remaining number of temporary wounds is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary wounds at the start of their turn.

Each attack against the Vanguard grants them +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g}. Each stack increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}Temporary wounds{/g} applied to the Vanguard now stack, but only remain stacked until the start of the Vanguard's turn. At the start of their turn, the remaining temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to the largest amount granted by one applied effect. If the remaining number of temporary wounds is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary wounds at the start of their turn.

Каждая атака против авангарда дает ему +1 уровень эффекта "{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}знак стойкости{/g}". Каждый уровень повышает его {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}решимость{/g} на 1 вплоть до 15. Все союзники в радиусе 2 клеток от авангарда получают 1/5 от этого {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонуса{/g}.
Бонусы {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}временного здоровья{/g} авангарда теперь суммируются, но только до начала его хода. Когда ход начинается, все эффекты, предоставляющие временное {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g}, снимаются, кроме одного — с наибольшим бонусом. Если оставшееся значение временного здоровья меньше, чем число знаков стойкости, или вовсе равно 0, то временное здоровье авангарда становится равным числу его знаков стойкости.

Each attack against the Vanguard grants them +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g}. Each stack increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}Temporary wounds{/g} applied to the Vanguard now stack, but only remain stacked until the start of the Vanguard's turn. traits.locale_text:
Каждая атака против авангарда дает ему +1 уровень эффекта "знак стойкости". Каждый уровень повышает его решимость на 1 вплоть до 15. Все союзники в радиусе 2 клеток от авангарда получают 1/5 от этого бонуса.
Бонусы временного здоровья авангарда теперь суммируются, но только до начала его хода. Когда ход начинается, все эффекты, предоставляющие временное здоровье, снимаются, кроме одного – с наибольшим бонусом. Если оставшееся значение временного здоровья меньше, чем число знаков стойкости, или вовсе равно 0, то временное здоровье авангарда становится равным числу его знаков стойкости.

Каждая атака против авангарда дает ему +1 уровень эффекта "знак стойкости". Каждый уровень повышает его решимость на 1 вплоть до 15. Все союзники в радиусе 2 клеток от авангарда получают 1/5 от этого бонуса.
Бонусы временного здоровья авангарда теперь суммируются, но только до начала его хода. Когда ход начинается, все эффекты, предоставляющие временное здоровье, снимаются, кроме одного – с наибольшим бонусом. Если оставшееся значение временного здоровья меньше, чем число знаков стойкости, или вовсе равно 0, то временное здоровье авангарда становится равным числу его знаков стойкости.

languages.text: 每当先锋遭到攻击时，都会获得1层不灭明光效果。每层效果提供+1{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，最多+15。先锋周围2格内的所有盟友会获得1/5的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}效果。 先锋从所有效果获得的{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}会叠加，但会在先锋的回合开始时消失。当先锋的回合开始时，所有效果带来的临时{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}会降低，降至等同于最强效果所给予的临时生命值。当先锋的回合开始时，若先锋没有临时生命值，或临时生命值低于“不灭明光”层数，则立刻获得临时生命值，总值等同于“不灭明光”层数。
languages.original_text: Each attack against the Vanguard grants them +1 stack of unyielding beacon. Each stack increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}Temporary wounds{/g} applied to the Vanguard now stack, but only remain stacked until the start of the Vanguard's turn. At the start of their turn, the remaining temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to the largest amount granted by one applied effect. If the remaining number of temporary wounds is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary wounds at the start of their turn.

traits.locale_text:
先锋每次攻击都会获得1层“不灭明光”效果。每层效果提供+1{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，最多+15。先锋周围2格内的所有盟友会获得1/5的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}效果。
先锋获得的{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}会不断叠加，但会在先锋的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时消失。当先锋的回合开始时，所有效果带来的临时生命值会降低，降至等同于最强效果所给予的临时生命值。当先锋的回合开始时，若先锋没有临时生命值，或临时生命值低于“不灭明光”层数，则立刻获得临时生命值，总值等同于“不灭明光”层数。

每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}先锋{/g}遭到攻击时，都会获得1层{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}不灭明光{/g}效果。每层效果提供+1{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}决心{/g}，最多+15。先锋周围2格内的所有盟友会获得1/5的{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}效果。
先锋从所有效果获得的{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}临时生命值{/g}会叠加，但会在先锋的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时消失。当先锋的回合开始时，所有效果带来的临时生命值会降低，降至等同于最强效果所给予的临时生命值。当先锋的回合开始时，若先锋没有临时生命值，或临时生命值低于“不灭明光”层数，则立刻获得临时生命值，总值等同于“不灭明光”层数。

languages.text: Cada ataque efectuado contra el vanguardia le otorga +1 acumulación de Dechado de firmeza. Cada acumulación aumenta su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}firmeza{/g} en +1, hasta un máximo de +15. Todos los aliados situados en un radio de 2 casillas en torno al vanguardia ganan una quinta parte de esa {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g}. Ahora las {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} que se apliquen al vanguardia se acumulan, pero solo duran acumuladas hasta el comienzo del turno del vanguardia. Al comienzo de su turno, las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} temporales que le queden se reducen a la cantidad más grande de todas las otorgadas por los distintos efectos aplicados. Si el número de heridas temporales restantes es inferior a la cantidad de acumulaciones de Dechado de firmeza, se equipara a esa cantidad de acumulaciones incluso aunque el vanguardia no tenga heridas temporales al comienzo de su turno.
languages.original_text: Each attack against the Vanguard grants them +1 stack of unyielding beacon. Each stack increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}Temporary wounds{/g} applied to the Vanguard now stack, but only remain stacked until the start of the Vanguard's turn. At the start of their turn, the remaining temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to the largest amount granted by one applied effect. If the remaining number of temporary wounds is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary wounds at the start of their turn.

traits.locale_text:
Cada ataque efectuado contra el vanguardia le otorga +1 acumulación de Dechado de firmeza. Cada acumulación aumenta su {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}brío{/g} en +1, hasta un máximo de +15. Todos los aliados situados en un radio de 2 casillas en torno al vanguardia ganan una quinta parte de esa {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g}.
Ahora las {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}heridas temporales{/g} que se apliquen al vanguardia se acumulan, pero solo duran acumuladas hasta el comienzo del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del vanguardia. Al comienzo de su turno, las heridas temporales que le queden se reducen a la cantidad más grande de todas las otorgadas por los distintos efectos aplicados. Si el número de heridas temporales restantes es inferior a la cantidad de acumulaciones de Dechado de firmeza, se equipara a esa cantidad de acumulaciones incluso aunque el vanguardia no tenga heridas temporales al comienzo de su turno.

languages.text: Jeder Angriff gegen die Vorhut gewährt ihr +1 Stapel "Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit". Jeder Stapel erhöht ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} um +1 auf maximal +15. Alle Verbündeten der Vorhut innerhalb eines Radius von 2 Feldern erhalten 1/5 dieses {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}Temporäre Wunden{/g} sind kumulativ, wenn sie auf die Vorhut angewandt werden und bis zum Beginn des nächsten Zuges der Vorhut gestapelt bleiben. Zu Beginn des Zuges werden die verbleibenden temporären {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} auf den höchsten Einzeleffekt reduziert. Ist die Zahl der gestapelten temporären Wunden niedriger als die Zahl der Stapel von "Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit", wird sie auch dann angeglichen, wenn die Vorhut zu Beginn ihres Zugs keine temporären Wunden hat.
languages.original_text: Each attack against the Vanguard grants them +1 stack of unyielding beacon. Each stack increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}Temporary wounds{/g} applied to the Vanguard now stack, but only remain stacked until the start of the Vanguard's turn. At the start of their turn, the remaining temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to the largest amount granted by one applied effect. If the remaining number of temporary wounds is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary wounds at the start of their turn.

traits.locale_text:
Jeder Angriff gegen die Vorhut gewährt ihr +1 Stapel von Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit. Jeder Stapel erhöht ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}Entschlossenheit{/g} um +1, bis maximal +15. Sämtliche Verbündeten der Vorhut innerhalb eines Radius von 2 Feldern erlangen 1/5 dieses {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}Temporäre Wunden{/g} stapeln sich nun, wenn sie auf die Vorhut angewendet werden, aber nur dann, wenn sie bis zum Beginn der nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} der Vorhut gestapelt bleiben. Bei Rundenbeginn werden die verbleibenden temporären Wunden auf den höchsten Einzeleffekt reduziert. Wenn die Stapelanzahl temporärer Wunden niedriger ist als die von Symbol der Unnachgiebigkeit, wird sie angeglichen, selbst wenn die Vorhut bei Rundenbeginn keine temporären Wunden hat.

languages.text: Chaque attaque menée contre le patrouilleur lui confère +1 cumul de Guide inflexible. Chaque cumul accroît sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} de +1, jusqu'à un maximum de +15. Tous les alliés présents dans un rayon de 2 cases autour du patrouilleur bénéficient de 1/5e de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. Les {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} appliquées au patrouilleur sont désormais cumulables, mais les cumuls ne sont conservés que jusqu'au début du tour du patrouilleur. Au début de son tour, les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} temporaires restantes sont réduites au plus grand nombre conféré par un effet appliqué. Si le nombre de blessures temporaires restantes est inférieur au nombre de cumuls de Guide inflexible, il est alors égal au nombre de ces cumuls, même si le patrouilleur ne possède pas de blessures temporaires au début de son tour.
languages.original_text: Each attack against the Vanguard grants them +1 stack of unyielding beacon. Each stack increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}Temporary wounds{/g} applied to the Vanguard now stack, but only remain stacked until the start of the Vanguard's turn. At the start of their turn, the remaining temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to the largest amount granted by one applied effect. If the remaining number of temporary wounds is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary wounds at the start of their turn.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque attaque menée contre le Patrouilleur lui confère +1 cumul de Guide Inflexible. Chaque cumul accroît sa {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}détermination{/g} de +1, jusqu'à un maximum de +15. Tous les alliés présents dans un rayon de 2 cases autour du Patrouilleur bénéficient de 1/5e de ce {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
Les {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}blessures temporaires{/g} appliquées au Patrouilleur sont désormais cumulables, mais les cumuls ne sont conservés que jusqu'au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du Patrouilleur. Au début de son tour, les blessures temporaires restantes sont réduites au plus grand nombre conféré par un effet appliqué. Si le nombre de blessures temporaires restantes est inférieur au nombre de cumuls de Guide Inflexible, il est alors égal au nombre de ces cumuls, même si le Patrouilleur ne possède pas de blessures temporaires au début de son tour.

languages.text:
ヴァンガードに対する攻撃ごとに、1スタックの{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}「不屈の標」{/g}を得る。1スタックごとに、{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が+1増加する（最大+15）。ヴァンガードの周囲2セル以内のすべての味方は、その{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の1/5を得る。
ヴァンガードに適用される{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}がスタックするようになるが、スタックするのはヴァンガードのターン開始まで。ヴァンガードのターン開始時に、残っていた一時的な傷は、適用されている効果のうち最大のもの1個の値まで減少する。一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の残量が「不屈の標」のスタック数よりも少ない場合、そのスタック数と同じだけ一時的な傷を得る。これはターン開始時に一時的な傷がない場合でも同様の効果を発揮する。
languages.original_text:
Each attack against the Vanguard grants them +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}unyielding beacon{/g}. Each stack increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}Temporary wounds{/g} applied to the Vanguard now stack, but only remain stacked until the start of the Vanguard's turn. At the start of their turn, the remaining temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to the largest amount granted by one applied effect. If the remaining number of temporary wounds is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary wounds at the start of their turn.

traits.locale_text:
ヴァンガードに対する攻撃ごとに、1スタックの{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}「不屈の標」{/g}を得る。1スタックごとに、{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が+1増加する（最大+15）。ヴァンガードの周囲2セル以内のすべての味方は、その{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の1/5を得る。
ヴァンガードに適用される{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時的な傷{/g}がスタックするようになるが、スタックするのはヴァンガードのターン開始まで。ヴァンガードのターン開始時に、残っていた一時的な傷は、適用されている効果のうち最大のもの1個の値まで減少する。一時的な{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}の残量が「不屈の標」のスタック数よりも少ない場合、そのスタック数と同じだけ一時的な傷を得る。これはターン開始時に一時的な傷がない場合でも同様の効果を発揮する。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerVanguardGlossary}ヴァンガード{/g}に対する攻撃ごとに、1スタックの{g|Encyclopedia:UnyieldingBeacon}「不屈の標」{/g}を得る。1スタックごとに、{g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}決断力{/g}が+1増加する（最大+15）。ヴァンガードの周囲2セル以内のすべての味方は、その{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}の1/5を得る。
ヴァンガードに適用される{g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}一時体力{/g}が累積するようになるが、累積するのはヴァンガードの{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始まで。ヴァンガードのターン開始時に、残っていた一時体力は、適用されている効果のうち最大のもの1個の値まで減少する。一時体力の残量が「不屈の標」のスタック数よりも少ない場合、そのスタック数と同じだけ一時体力を得る。これはターン開始時に一時体力がない場合でも同様の効果を発揮する。

languages.text: Öncü'ye karşı yapılan her saldırı ona +1 yılmaz fener birikimi kazandırır. Her bir birikim, {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}kararlılık{/g} değerini 1 puan (maksimum 15) artırır. Öncü'nün çevresindeki 2 hücrelik yarıçap içindeki tüm dost birimler, bu {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusun{/g} 1/5'ini kazanır. Öncü'ye uygulanan {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}geçici sağlık{/g} puanları üst üste birikir ancak yalnızca Öncü'nün turunun başlangıcına dek birikimli kalırlar. Turu başladığında kalan geçici {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı, uygulanan etkilerden en yüksek değeri verene indirilir. Kalan geçici sağlık puanı; yılmaz fener birikimi sayısından düşükse, Öncü'nün turu başladığında hiç geçici sağlık puanı olmasa bile, bu birikimlerin miktarına eşitlenir.
languages.original_text: Each attack against the Vanguard grants them +1 stack of unyielding beacon. Each stack increases their {g|Encyclopedia:Resolve}resolve{/g} by +1, up to a maximum of +15. All allies in a 2-cell radius around the Vanguard gain 1/5 of that {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:TemporaryWounds}Temporary wounds{/g} applied to the Vanguard now stack, but only remain stacked until the start of the Vanguard's turn. At the start of their turn, the remaining temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} are reduced to the largest amount granted by one applied effect. If the remaining number of temporary wounds is less than the number of stacks of unyielding beacon, it becomes equal to the number of those stacks even if the Vanguard has no temporary wounds at the start of their turn.
